gate.creole.ontology.impl.sesame

Class OntologyLR

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageResource
          • gate.creole.ontology.impl.AbstractOntologyImpl
            • gate.creole.ontology.impl.sesame.AbstractOntologyImplSesame
              • gate.creole.ontology.impl.sesame.OntologyLR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ontology, CreoleListener, ActionsPublisher, LanguageResource, Resource, FeatureBearer, NameBearer, Serializable, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectSesameOntology, CreateSesameOntology, OWLIMOntology

    public abstract class OntologyLR
extends AbstractOntologyImplSesame
implements ActionsPublisher, CreoleListener
    The common abstract base class for all ontology LRs in this implementation.
    Author:
    Johann Petrak
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Specified by:

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        This method deletes the repository from memory and releases all resources occupied by the ontology. Please note that after calling this method, any call to any method of the ontology will throw an exception complaining that the repository does not exist. So this should be the last call to this ontology when you decide to discard this instance of ontology.
        Specified by:
        cleanup in interface Resource
        Overrides:
        cleanup in class AbstractOntologyImpl
